text: HTrdf <efly <THrf: gferar<ut T41i / Phona 91-11-25074100/25074200 (iem waevt 3r roTHTi HTGT4) 44R / Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 TT M Ht TT National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) +i-5 W 6, 747-10, ETIAT, # faori 110 075 6-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAI/I3029/02/2009-Vig: 13mh January, 2012 PQLCY CIRCULAR TECH: (96/2012) (Decision taken on File No. 13029 /02/2009-Vig:) Sub: Ptice Adiustment tor_variation in Binder Content [eq It has been noted that  provision for price adjustment due to variance in percentage of binder used compared to percentage specified for BOQ item has not been included in some contracts although there exist explicit provisions in MORTH specifications regarding this. Consequently, no deduction is being made in payment despite use of lesser binder content: MoRT&H specifications for Road and   Bridge works   clearly lays down the minimum percentagelpermissible limit percentage of bitumen content and the rate for BOQ items are with a fixed percentage of binder content: The relevant clauses for such BOQ items clearly specify the price adjustment, up and down, for variance in actual percentage of bitumen Used: Accordingly, Technical Divisions are directed to ensure that all future contracts invariably include the complete description as per MoRT&H specifications including price adjustment clause for variance in actual binder content: Competent Authority has also directed for  removing the anomalies and introduction of cost adjustment clause in all such type of Agreements/Tenders This issues with the approval of the Competent Authority.
